name: Beep Pick - Brackeys Jam1 - 2023
description:
King Ping Studio presents Beep Pick a small little game we tried to put together for the Brackeys game jam 1 - 2023. 

We had very small time available and unfortunately we were not able to include all the functionalities we originally planned but the game will hopefully be funny to play.

Please leave as a comment or a feedback!

CREDITS

Developer: Alessandro Ambrosone; Derek for the AI boid assembly (no time to complete the enemy damage effect)

Musician: Peter Hawkey: https://soundcloud.com/peterhawkey

Game design and graphic: Pete and Karoll
